Colophon

Design system

These are the theme tokens used across the site.

Background — --color-bg

Text — --color-text

Headings — --color-ink

Border — --color-border

Accent — --color-accent

Design inspiration

The layout draws inspiration from the work of Nikita Sobolev. The theme supports light/dark modes using CSS custom properties.
